code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/Navbar.css";import ReorderIcon from'@material-ui/icons/Reorder';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[expandNavBar,setExpandNavbar]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{setExpandNavbar(false);},[location]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",id:expandNavBar?"open":"close",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toggleButton",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setExpandNavbar(prev=>!prev);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReorderIcon,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/portfolio",children:" Home "})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/portfolio/projects",children:" Projects "})})]})]});}export default Navbar;
